name: Brutal Bible Bloodbaths
description: Based on a shocking Bible passage, use your magic laser sword to chop up everything that breathes causing blood to spray and splatter everywhere.

name: Someone's Outside
description: You had a long day at work and just arrived home. However, something feels off.

name: Colony: Part I The Moon Castle
description: Humanity has experienced many technological revolutions in 200 years. Thanks to these revolutions, it can be expanded into space. They established colonies on Mars and the Moon. However, with the surprise attacks on the Moon colony, the youth began to experience difficult times..

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Berlin Brandenburg V2
description: Being infamous for its construction delays, the German capital's new airport is finally open and available for X-Plane!

name: Das Teufelswad
description:
Das Teufelswad is a 3 map pk3 with a hub level. You can play the levels in any order, but the chronological order they were made in is
1. Die Teufelsmaschine (originally released in RAMP2021)
2. Die Teufelsbrücke (originally released in RAMP2022)
3. Der Teufelsturm (Brand new - fresh out of the oven)

name: Summer and Winter Sports Games Bundle: 4K Edition
description: 18 sports for 1 to 4 players!

name: Adventure Of Baldero I and II
description: Lord Marn is releasing Abominations in the area where Baldero, our bold and bald hero, took a nap to rest up. The Goddess of mercy, Myla, enters Baldero's dreams to warn him of the up-coming battles. There are many foes to fight before Baldero can stop Marn, will you help him?

name: Fantasy Beauties
description: Fantasy beauties are hidden behind puzzles – dare you unveil them?

name: GigaBash: Godzilla - Nemesis DLC
description:
The Nemeses of Godzilla have invaded!
This DLC adds King Ghidorah and Hedorah from the Godzilla universe to the playable roster. Each character features a unique skillset and playstyle inspired by iconic moments seen in their respective films.

name: Kaetram
description: Adventure through a large world, unlock secret areas, complete quests, and collaborate with others to defeat bosses and become the best!

name: Basic Biking
description:
Physics-based pedaling!

Alternately push the buttons to pedal the bike, one button for each leg. Try to reach the goal without falling down.

name: Scorching Earth
description: Scorching Earth is a 32-map vanilla megawad for Doom 2. Inspired by Hellbound by Z86, Scorching Earth features highly detailed maps that are connected to each other to give the wad continuity.

name: FlowerRock
description: FlowerRock is a 2D platformer for players who love intense boss fights and an mysterious story. Something happened to this world, powerful enemies and secrets litter the landscape. Unlock upgrades for your laser to blast stronger enemies and unravel the story of what happened to this forsaken world.

name: Weekend in Waimanalo
description: Weekend in Waimanalo is a romantic comedy yuri visual novel and dating sim. This is a game about love, respect, friendship, self-exploration, and mental health. Explore this hidden side of Oahu, get to know interesting characters, and see how your decisions affect where Rachel ends up and with who!

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Miriam's Complete Cosmetic Bundle
description:
Miriam’s Complete Cosmetic Bundle contains all three premium DLC cosmetic packs designed to give Miriam unique looks in the game. Fight demons in style with these stylish new looks!

The bundle includes the Succubus, Magical Girl and Japanesque cosmetic packs.

Each cosmetic set includes multiple unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When all of the items for a set are equipped, the character’s HUD updates with a unique appearance.

The individual pieces each have their own stats and can be upgraded by crafting.

Succubus Cosmetic Set
- Scythe (WEAPON)
- Vampiric Wig (HEAD)
- Vampiric Skinsuit (BODY)
- Vampiric Wings (ACCESSORY)
- Vampiric Choker (SCARF)
- Dream Steal (SHARD)

Magical Girl Cosmetic Set
- Miri Scepter (WEAPON)
- Miri Wig (HEAD)
- Miri Dress (BODY)
- Communicator (ACCESSORY)
- Summon Bu-chan (SHARD)
- Familiar: Bu-chan (FAMILIAR)

Japanesque Cosmetic Set
- Japanesque Umbrella (WEAPON)
- Japanesque Wig (HEAD)
- Japanesque Robe (BODY)
- Sarashi (ACCESSORY)
- Usagi Mask (ACCESSORY)
- Sakura Storm (SHARD)

name: Kyukyoku TigerHeli: Console Ports + Get Star Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Head Sports Football
description: In Head Sports Football, you control a player with a huge head as you compete against experienced opponents in exciting football matches.

name: Plumber Pipe Out
description: Plumber Pipe Out is a fun and challenging puzzle game in which you must act as a plumber and try to connect all the pipes.

name: Archean
description: Archean is a realistic, immersive engineering sandbox and full scale space sim. Featuring Earth 3 billion years in the past, in the Archean eon.

name: Berry Bash
description: Survivor - Welcome to Fruitland. Your task is to Improve yourself more efficiently than the residents of the city. Improve your skills, weapons and unlock new items, but don't forget that the Fruits and Vegetables are getting stronger too!

name: Little Legs
description: Discover the wonderful world of cute insects!

name: Heaven Impact
description: Find your way to escape the vengeance of Heaven!

name: 8th Millenium: War Against The Pagan Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: 3 minutes Mystery 2
description: Unravel the New Mystery! You are the one to uncover the truth behind the crime scene by finding hidden evidence.

name: Sekimori Gami: Saien
description: "A Yandere Young Man's Pursuit in an Otome Game" A girl works at "Gokurakudou," a shop in another world, alongside a young man known as "Yoruichi."

name: Pinball FX: Pacific Rim Pinball
description: Go big or go extinct. Prime your senses for a neural handshake and step into the cockpit of a Jaeger. It is on you to cancel the apocalypse!

name: Pinball FX: Super League Football
description: Guide your football team in their quest to become Super League Champions.

name: Ultimate Traffic Sign Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: A Simple Life
description: Start living a more Simple Life in these rushed times! In this casual experience you can plant crops, harvest, and discover more garden varieties as the Seasons pass on. There are no time restrictions. See how much you can harvest in the years to come!

name: Puzzle World: Cute Cats
description: Rotate the puzzle elements and collect all the amazing cute cat images!

name: Puzzle World: Neko Girls
description: Rotate the puzzle elements and collect all the amazing anime style images!

name: Slide Puzzle World History
description:
For Current Students and Those Relearning!
Fun World History Puzzle Game

name: Little Cat Doctor
description: Work as a veterinarian at our animal hospital and be the doctor for adorable little cats. Assist our furry friends in regaining their health and happiness. Unlock new hospitals and enjoy the best time playing this wonderful game!

name: Spy Guy Memory
description: Spy Guy Memory improves on the classic memory game formula. It gives you the ability to increase the difficulty level at your own speed and customize the challenges.

name: Zombie Night Defense
description: Zombie Night Defense is an action tower defense game.

name: Gakuen Idolmaster
description: An idol raising simulation mobile game in The Idolmaster series featuring a completely new branch of idols. Enroll in Hatsuboshi Gakuen to learn the ropes of being a producer by partnering up with various idol students to help them raise to the top!

name: Ice Crush 10.000 BC
description: Crush ice blocks!

name: Mounted Knights Battle: Medieval Warrior Simulator
description: Experience the thrill of medieval chivalry in Mounted Knights Battle, where you'll embark on a captivating journey as a courageous knight vying for honor and romance. Craft your own legendary warrior, proudly wave your chosen flag, and fortify your armor, spear, and steed to triumph in prestigious tournaments held across a multitude of vibrant cities.

name: Melo's Nightmare
description:
Melo's Nightmare is a first-person perspective 3D escape horror game.
Players find themselves trapped in corridors and must investigate puzzles to attempt escape.
Fulfilling the conditions to escape hidden passageways will unlock the next door.
Activating or finding the correct puzzle triggers changes in the environment.

name: Idle Taoist Mage Warrior 2
description: This is a well-built place hang-up RPG game, for players to bring fighters, mage, Taoist three career choices, each career has unique characteristics, so that players in the game to experience different combat pleasure.

name: The Nightmare Of Arrival Chapter 1
description: Simon Story.... After retiring from the military, Simon's descent into alcohol addiction leads him to a fateful night of heavy drinking. A fall down a flight of stairs renders him unconscious,

name: Toxic Place
description: Toxic Place, an exciting story in the form of a soul like game, combined with a sandbox for you to experience adventure. In a world full of pollution and monsters that have been affected have mutated into terrifying creatures. Will you be able to survive this cruel world?

name: Pinball FX: Universal Pinball - TV Classics
description: Classic television shows from the small screen to the tips of your flipper fingers. Play three tables inspired by iconic TV shows in the Universal Pinball: TV Classics bundle pack.

name: Legends Resurrected Online
description: Legends Resurrected Online It is a Free MMORPG with a classic 2D style. Explore and discover the wide variety of weapons and items you can obtain. Find a group and take down the wild beasts, create equipment to aid your progress.

name: Ultimate Swing Golf
description: Clap Hanz, the beloved golf game developer, presents the definitive golf experience in Ultimate Swing Golf! The intuitive shot system recreates the feel and exhilaration of golf in a VR world. Simply swing your controller to adjust your power and the direction of the ball!

name: PO'ed: Definitive Edition
description:
It's a remaster of 1995's shooter PO’ed. It fixes bugs present in the original game and brings several QoL features to enhance the gameplay, plus a new hardcore difficulty. However, these are togglable features which means the players can also play the remastered version with the bugs and without the QoL features.

The remaster also supports widescreen modes with properly adjusted HUD. In addition, there are 15 achievements to hunt for. PO’ed: Definitive Edition can be played with enhanced controls, antialiasing and increased framerate up to 4K 144 frames per second performance.

name: Gooner on the Orient Express
description: Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train.

name: Cyber Workshop
description: Cyber Workshop is a resource creation video game. You control a transporter drone in a small workshop and, using the machines available to you, create custom items for order - drones, reactors, implants, and so on.

name: Kingdom of Arcana
description: Embark on a magical odyssey in Arcania! Play as Aurelius, a skilled mage battling to liberate five kingdoms from the tyrannical grip of the sinister Malachus. Explore 50 levels across 5 enchanted realms, conquer 20 bosses, and unveil your destiny in this gripping third-person roguelite adventure.

name: Shatterbound
description: Work with your past (and future) selves to solve puzzles. Shatter your obstacles, be your own platform, and more in this time-looping puzzler where YOU are your own solution!

name: Cozy Caravan
description: Embark on a single-player, top-down journey in Cozy Caravan, where the arts of crafting, trading, and exploration come together in a beautifully cozy world. Form lasting bonds as you and your caravan journey through charming towns, enriching lives along the way.

name: Byte Hack
description: ByteHack is a puzzle platformer where you play as an agent from the hip new anti-malware software, Morton. Fight against the infected GPU system as the computer slowly gets more and more destroyed.

name: Dino Dino
description: Playfully extend your knowledge about dinosaurs in a collection of mini games. Created in cooperation with the German Paleontological Society, featuring voice recordings and hand-drawn illustrations, Dino Dino sets out to awaken your kids's interest in complex topics while being a lot of fun.

name: Ziggy's Labyrinth
description: Ziggy's Labyrinth is a level based snake game. Traverse through portals, teleport around the map, and phase through walls in over 150 stages.

name: Furea Uerzt
description: Your Furea Uerzt adventure awaits! Explore the dynamic Mars landscape. Become a hero who protects Earth from extinction due to a meteor strike. Activates quantum teleportation and future-related electromagnetic fields as a shield. Fun experience Furea Uerzt.

name: Masters of Light
description: Feel the pulse of MASTERS OF LIGHT, an electrifying action adventure game where you harness unstoppable magic superpowers !

name: Bloody Good Friends
description: Explore Mirian's world in the Bloody Good Friends visual novel! Spend time at school with her friends, learn about characters, interests, future plans and dreams! Just beware of the demons of the past that won't stop chasing you!

name: If we meet after the ending
description: "Long time no see. You've grown up a lot." 10 years ago, a lover who left me in an accident appeared as a ghost. Can we undo the belated regret?

name: Arctic Eggs
description: A Sci-Fi Cooking game where you take up the role of a Poultry Peddler stuck in Antarctica and longing for a way out. Sell your illegal eggs to those who look hungry.

name: Presence Lookout
description: Presence Lookout is an Observation spot the difference Horror game where the player has to spot different "anomalies" through the map. Anomalies can be anything from an object that has been moved to another location, rotated or even an unknown entity that shouldn't be. Report the Anomalies to win!

name: Break the Loop
description: Break the Loop is a turn-based Rogue-like RPG. Compose your team and create a timeline by selecting the events you'll go through. Each decision will bring you one step closer to the ultimate threat, but will you have accumulated enough power to stop the apocalypse?

name: Abyss
description: Abyss Online is an immersive MMORPG set in the mystical world of Aeternea. Engage in epic quests, intense combat, and shape your destiny. Customize your character with powerful weapons and armors. Explore diverse landscapes and uncover hidden secrets. Experience a captivating online adventure.

name: American Truck Simulator: Nebraska
description: Located in the heart of the Great Plains, Nebraska’s vast and diverse landscape consists of prairies, rolling hills, and the crucial Platte River. While hauling cargo through the Cornhusker State along historic routes, you will have many opportunities to witness iconic landmarks and truly immerse yourself in the state's spirit, from its pioneer history to the modern energy of cities full of ever-growing industries. Our goal is for the DLC to offer a fusion of peaceful landscapes and the rhythm of a buzzing economy that's unlike any other.

name: Drag Her!
description: Drag Her! is a fast, frenetic, and fundamentally fabulous fighting game featuring drag royalty. With a cast of iconic characters from the Drag Race & Dragula universes, Drag Her! gives you the core fighting game fantasy, with an experience that is equal parts stupid and fun.

name: Sex and the Furry Titty 3: Come Inside, Sweety
description: Sex and the Furry Titty 3 is turning the heat up to the max! More sex, more tittes and more wild furry ladies! Five new VOICE ACTED scenarios will plunge you even deeper into the throbbing warmth full of seductice choices. Conquer the match-3 challenges, enjoy the most tempting animated scenes yet.

name: NTR'd By Clumsiness
description: A month after the death of his friend, Chris decides to invite his late friend's son—Jeff—to stay at his house for two weeks while he's in transition to go to college. On the eve of Jeff moving in, Chris decides to mention to his wife the danger that she's about to face; the boy is unusually clumsy.

name: Citadel Stormer 2
description: Blast your way through a world of deadly robots and monstrous machines in this explosive run-and-gun action platformer inspired by '90s classics!

name: My Holiness the Gobliness
description: You're a man who fainted on his journey, and was rescued in another world at your final hour by Anubis the Goblin Shaman to be treated at her temple.As her servant, you must take care of the everyday tasks for the lazy shaman.

name: Pool Party
description:
Challenge your friends and have a ball in tons of chaotic party games!

Dive into a wave of fun at the Pool Party resort! Play solo or with up to four players in tons of sports & brawl games and fight to become king of the party. Customize your pool ball – choose your favorite color and design - and go head-to-head with your friends. Have a splashing good time!

These pool balls are not just adorable, but also surprisingly athletic. They reach ridiculous speeds as they roll and bounce around the arena in no-time! Plus, these balls can kick each other around because they're balls after all! You'll be amazed by the sheer power of a perfectly aimed kick, propelling a rival ball all over the stage. Grab a cue and join the party!

name: Still Joking
description: What do mirror reflections do once they have no one to repeat after anymore? This game offers you a few ideas to explore.

name: Rungore
description: Card game mechanics - check; Real time battles - check; Silly humor - check. If this isn't the game of your dreams i don't know what is (Also we have hidden memes everywhere lol)

name: Prescience
description: Unlike other single player deckbuilder, you are going to fill a bag with black and white stones. Wether you can use your skills depends on the order you pick the stones. Build a unique combo, defeat powerful enemies, and don't forget to use your Prescience!

name: Combo Card Clashers
description: Combo Card Clashers is an auto battler meets roguelike deckbuilder - Choose cards for your combo grid and play them all each turn! Build a balanced deck, craft powerful card combos, and use tactical decisions to unravel each hero's mystery while saving the world.

name: Lorelei and the Laser Eyes
description:
A woman, summoned by an eccentric man to participate in a project in an old hotel somewhere in central Europe, becomes embroiled in a game of illusions, increasingly dangerous and surreal.

Now you are invited to fall into the same rabbit hole, in a non-linear mystery with an immense amount of handcrafted puzzles, constantly presenting you with new riddles to solve, each leading you closer to deciphering the enigma of Lorelei and the Laser Eyes.

name: Wantless: Solace at World’s End
description: Wantless is a PC turn-based tactical RPG set in a bleak future. Fight woes and nightmares made manifest inside your patients' procedurally generated minds, craft your own skills with overwhelming freedom, loot, gear up, customize, earn reputation. Leave your mark on a dying world.

name: Hackshot
description:
Hackshot is a twisted and extremely deep puzzle take on artillery games.
You are a hacker with the ability to craft unique projectiles, by mixing and matching different abilities. Use your imagination to hack in creative ways, and become a master hacker.

The game contains over 20 hours of shooting viruses and crashing the security, optional content and game modes, open-ended levels, over 7000 unique Cyberballs to craft. In addition, hackers will hack you back and there are no filler levels or condescending tutorials. Just pure challenging fun!

name: Hexahedra
description: Hexahedra is an open-ended programming puzzle game. Design and optimize factories to build cubes, used galaxy-wide as crates, musical instruments, even chic coffins. Rewind and replay the action to hunt for improvements. Compete with friends, and help a tiny octopus with a nightmare family visit.

name: Musashi vs. Cthulhu
description: Musashi vs Cthulhu (or MxC) is a fast-paced action game where you take control of Musashi - the most famous warrior from feudal Japan -, as he’s fighting for his life. The samurai is a victim of a terrible curse that makes him a target for unspeakable monsters.

name: Die by the Blade
description: Vanquish your foes with a single strike in 1v1 weapon-based fighter Die by the Blade. Dive into a samuraipunk world and wield a range of traditional Japanese weapons to determine your moveset. Outwit your opponent in intense, tactical battles and master the art of the one-hit kill!

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver
description: Return to the vibrant cyberpunk world of Neo-San Francisco from 2064: Read Only Memories, filled with friendly and familiar faces. Neurodiver will introduce new characters, locations, and mechanics, including the ability to dive into and change other characters' memories, as well as overhauled art and an unsolved case to crack with multiple endings.

name: Beat the Clock
description: Beat the Clock is a turn-based Rogue-like RPG in a fantasy world. Form your team amongst the twenty heroes available. Travel back in time, experience various random events and face the disaster that caused the end of Humanity. The clock is ticking... run, die and retry!

name: Slime Nomi
description: Slime Nomi is a platformer with creative ideas. Help Nomi collect potion ingredients and concoct witch Millie's extraordinary potion.

name: Federico Returns
description: Sin descripción

name: Mullet Madjack: Deluxe Edition
description: Mullet Madjack is a single-player fast-paced FPS that brings you directly inside a classic anime. The DELUXE Edition contains Mullet Mad Jack GAME, an official ARTBOOK and OST SOUNDTRACKS !

name: Creepy Pomni
description: Overcome obby challenges and puzzles, get through rooms of horror in a digital circus. Try not to get caught by Pomni, Jax, Caine and Gangle who have gone crazy.

name: Skibidi Toilet Hero: Sex Mod
description:
This is DLC Created for those who are ready to test themselves and their skill to the limit.
New Difficulty Level
Level Rebalance
New Enemies
New Final Boss
BDSM Costumes for toilets!

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite UMX Conscendo
description: The E-flite UMX Conscendo is a scaled-down, ultra-micro version of the Conscendo Evolution 1.5m!

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Turbo Timber SWS 2.0m
description: The E-flite Turbo Timber SWS (Sport Wood Series) 2.0m is the largest Timber model from E-flite yet, plus it offers the advantages of lightweight, stiff and strong wood construction.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Triple Tree Float Flight Line
description: Fly your model aircraft from the dock or the water at the premier floatplane site at Triple Tree Aerodrome in Woodruff, SC.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Cherokee 1.3m
description: This updated and upgraded version of the popular E-flite Cherokee 1.3m is a Smarter tribute to the general aviation classic that features a variety of scale details and functional features including lights, flaps, a full-flying stabilator, and more.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Blade Eclipse 360
description: The Blade Eclipse 360 combines a fully-molded EPO body with futuristic looks and a high-performance airframe to deliver a unique blend of hovering, scale-like, sport, and aerobatic flying capabilities for intermediate to experienced heli pilots.

name: WWE 2K24: ECW Punk Pack
description: Go extreme with the ECW Punk Pack, featuring the highly-anticipated return of CM Punk and a selection of several of the most hardcore ECW Legends. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card. The ECW Punk Pack is already included with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass.

name: Undead Paradise
description: First Person wave-based horde survival. Defeat endless hordes of enemies to reach higher scores!

name: Sdies
description: Explore a surreal world full of contrasts: black and white, friends and enemies, serenity and agitation. When the time comes, what we resist will persist, what we accept will transform, and through self transformation, we will discover the spectrum in between.

name: Overtime Heroes Exit 8
description: You are in A CORPORATE SLAVE walking simulator. Being trapped in an infinite loop space, you just wanna find way to get off. Find out the anomalies in floors and choose the elevator carefully! Only the correct one can get you out.

name: Wayfarer
description: Progress thought labyrinthine caves and solve entertaining puzzles. Explore this incredible adventure where loneliness becomes your closest companion as you search clues amidst stunning landscapes and ancient ruins.

name: Roulette Simulator 2025
description: Roulette Simulator 2025 offers players an incredible modern Roulette gambling simulation. Experience the emotions of gambling in real-time as you try to beat the roulette wheel as you bet on each spin.

name: Timeless Tesseract
description: Introducing Timeless Tesseract - The First 3D Parkour Platformer That Lets You Control Time! By Captain Tesseract

name: Turbo Pulse Race
description: In the game, when you drift, you increase your level with the points you earn and unlock cars accordingly. With fast and fluid gameplay, your mistakes might not leave cars behind you.

name: Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator - Seaside Business
description: Dive into Miami's vibrant Seaside District in the expansion for Parking Tycoon Business Simulator! Enjoy stunning ocean views, manage a surfboard rental shop, and implement high-tech parking solutions. Build your empire and become the parking tycoon of the sunny waterfront!

name: Ultrakanoid
description: Ultrakanoid is an exciting game that will allow you to immerse yourself in a nostalgic atmosphere. In this game, you will control a platform and juggle fish, which must break blocks on the playing field to complete the level.

name: Cataclysm: Even Angels Sin
description: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Heaven Breaker and reclaim the divine realm.

name: Vaygren: Lustful Temptation
description: Vaygren: Lustful Temptation is an erotic visual novel with multiple routes and unlockables. The game features fully animated scenes and stunningly beautiful fantasy women. You’ll be meeting, flirting, frolicking, and fighting alongside these women in a high-stakes adventure.

name: Amikin Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Banana Cowboy
description: Play as Banana Cowboy and adventure in fruit-themed universe, rescuing your people from your evil twin who has taken over the Banana Kingdom. Use your trusty lasso and spaceship horse to travel to the Orange Biker and Blueberry Pirate planets and save the universe from the Evil King!

name: Reflect
description: This is a simple and complex puzzle game about light. You need to use Optical components to direct lights and lit up the rings.

name: Atomic Warfare
description: Atomic Warfare is a thrilling and strategic game that allows players to represent a country in a high-stakes battle.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Birds 2
description: Puzzles of Birds!

name: Magic Trap
description: Protect the obelisk!

name: LaughterLost
description: LaughterLost takes you through a surreal journey of work and family life. Face psychological twists, narrative choices, puzzles, and unexpected unique confrontations! Will you break this dystopian cycle of everyday life?

name: Just You
description: "Only One Must Remain Alive" thrusts you into a relentless battleground where survival hinges solely on your individual prowess.

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Evandra Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Evandra (if you don't already own them) Plushie Evandra Skin An Epic Feat for Evandra 7 Gold Evandra Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Nixie Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nixie (if you don't already own them) Plushie Nixie Skin An Epic Feat for Nixie 7 Gold Nixie Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Climb Up To The Sky
description: Climb Up to the Sky is an adrenaline-fueled game that will put your reflexes and precision to the test.

name: Black Screen
description: This game is nothing more than a dark image covering the entire screen area, without the presence of any additional extraneous stimuli. The freedom of own imagination and interpretation of the experience is under the complete control of the player.

name: Turbo Dash Kart 2024 Racing
description:
Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush with our action-packed kart racing game. Choose your champion driver, customize your ride, and dominate challenging tracks to become the undisputed ruler of the asphalt jungle! Buckle up for a heart-pounding adventure where strategy and skill meet lightning-fast laps.

With stunning graphics and endless upgrades, this game promises an unforgettable ride for all speed enthusiasts. Become a racing legend in this adrenaline-fueled adventure! So, buckle up! The race begins now!

name: Modified Spaceship
description: A space pixel game operated by mouse and keyboardFree gamesBlow your courage by getting different parts to fight off waves of enemies

name: Sector Alpha
description: A boom compatible map from Async Unicorn.

name: Across the Obelisk: The Obsidian Uprising
description: In The Obsidian Uprising, you'll travel 30 years back in time to the dwarven city of Black Forge and discover a thrilling new Across the Obelisk story. Disaster looms over Black Forge. Gather your band of heroes, restore peace and battle your way back to present-day Senenthia.

name: Across the Obelisk: Nenukil, the Engineer
description: Nenukil, the Engineer is a Hero Pack that introduces a brand new Scout class character with a powerful gameplay mechanic and a unique dynamic skin. Unlock a pet with a potent debuff ability and discover untold tales of one of the heroes of The Obsidian Uprising.

name: Suspects Room: Keishichou Monzensho Torishirabe-han
description: Sin descripción

name: Seekl
description: After clicking an old link on a forum, you’ve stumbled into a server of strange hackers, each with their own axe to grind. They’re (reluctantly) willing to give you some lessons, but is there something else to gain during your time here?

name: Mbembe Radio
description: This is a horror adventure game. Let's take on the challenges presented by the radio and make the journey home enjoyable. Fun may also include some fear.

name: Chalicebound
description: Chalicebound is a short dark fantasy point & click adventure, mainly inspired by Shadowgate and Vermis.

name: Knights Vault
description: Knights Vault is simply a multiplayer Souls Like Platformer. Run, jump and dodge roll your way through many environments and obstacles while fighting other players in your lobby, only one knight will stand victorious vaulting their way to the grand treasure!

name: AJ 11: Cosmic Climb
description: A browser-based platforming game promoting Nike's AJ XI shoes run from a ROM that can be booted on Game Boy Color.

name: Kanna Maze
description: In an isolated lab beneath the earth, a childhood friend is resurrected. Amidst sealed walls, a spree of killings unfolds. In a godless abyss, parallel worlds entwine like a maze. Where does one find the path to the sole universe of bliss?

name: Roman Empire Farming
description: Can you cultivate the lands of the ancient world and forge a prosperous legacy for generations to come?

name: Zeta Wolf: First Bite
description: Explore the budding friendship between Carly and Siona — two girls whose personalities couldn't be more different! Will their friendship blossom into something more? Or will their selfish desires drive a wedge between them? Find out in this lighthearted prequel to Zeta Wolf Chronicles!

name: Songs of Travel
description: An animated graphic novel exploring the unique stories of five migrants seeking new beginnings in Europe. Together, these stories paint a mosaic of themes such as our hopes, dreams, and identities; home; and the things we treasure most.

name: Bird Feather: Aquamarine World
description: You are bird. Just fly! Collect feathers in open world bird game. Collect more feathers to unlock nice Kingfisher photos. After collect all feathers you can just fly and enjoy!

name: World Neverland 2: Pluto Kyouwakoku Monogatari - Experience of Fiction Life
description: In this fictional, peaceful country where many people live, players are free to do everything in their lives, including work, training, love, raising children, and participating in events and tournaments. It's a game that you can relax, enjoy, and be happy.

name: Guild of Guardians
description: Guild of Guardians is a mobile roguelite Squad RPG where players build their dream team of Guardians and compete in a guild to earn epic, tradable rewards.

name: Superdeluxe
description: Superdeluxe is a visual novel where you play as a trans woman, and explore stories of her Friends!

name: Egggg
description: This is a simple game where all you need to do is control an egg to jump and climb high mountains to return to its nest. Trust me, most people will complete this challenge in a relaxed and pleasant mood.

name: Pilapila
description: An indie puzzle game about rearranging blocks to reach your goal.

name: Deep Beyond
description: Deep Beyond Is a first-person interactive thriller about a sea explorer and the mystery behind her father’s disappearance.

name: It's Skrot-Robot Time!
description: It's Skrot-Robot time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game. Set out with 1 of several soldier-like class-types. Obliterate robots with guns. Upgrade with new gear and different skills later on. Be the resistance fighter needed to stand off against the devastating skrot-konstrukts.

name: Astral Rift
description: Fight and Explore your way through randomly generated dungeons full of hordes of dangerous enemies and powerful bosses to restore the Astral Crystal and save the world from spatial collapse! Expand your arsenal and brew potent potions as you grow into the strongest adventurer of all!

name: Element Release: Water Territory
description: The element race gifted on Element Release rules the ungifted slave, but appearing of the Element Ring breaks the mold. The rebellion of slaves raid the Water Territory, and the lord spells a Water Enchantment. As a memory loss prisoner of element race, the most important thing for you is escape...

name: Realm Of I
description: Realm Of I is an action-adventure-platformer styled with low-res yet detailed pixel art.

name: Honker
description: Embark on a delightful goose-chasing adventure in Honker! Can you spot the mischievous goose amidst a flock of look-alikes? Test your keen eye and attention to detail in this charming and addictive game!

name: The Legend of Sebb Linus
description: Slip into the role of Sebb Linus, a former NCF agent, and sneak into enemy bases undetected. Stay undetected so as not to raise the alarm. Experience the old-school stealth genre.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Foresight
description:
A new dungeon-crawler RPG game in the Genso Wanderer series.
Embark on an adventure with Reimu and friends to solve incidents.

name: Spartacus Card Game
description: Spartacus Card Game is a Gladiator Fighting Card Game for 1 to 2 players.

name: Cubebam
description: Is an exciting 2D physics game where the player has to help grandfather in a barrel break cubes and get to the coin. The goal of the game is to use the available projectiles, which can be obtained by breaking colored cubes.

name: Cento
description: CENTO is a game where you enter commands in time with music and activate skills to fight. Collect gifts while reinforcing your skills and fight on stages with a wide variety of songs!

name: Aeruta
description: A bread revolution across the world now begins! Aeruta is a side-scrolling action game with a shop management twist, fight monsters for materials and use them to make breads, then finally make the deserted town popular again!

name: Kingdom of Fallen: The Last Stand
description: Kingdom of Fallen is inspired by survival and souls-like games. Your mission is to gather clues of your missing daughter, using your own way to defeat fearsome bosses, through crafting or fighting, to reveal the secrets, and get out of this cursed kingdom.

name: Purple Explorer
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Purple Explorer, where cuteness and adventure collide! Join our plucky protagonist, the lovable Purple Explorer girl, as she embarks on a heartwarming 3D platforming journey through vibrant worlds filled with stars, coins, hearts, and charming surprises.

name: Violet
description: You woke up in a Forest's Cemetery, with no memory. Uncover the secrets, solve Riddles and Puzzles in a Psychological Thriller based on the Classic Survival Horror Games that you liked best in the 90's with Modern Over the Shoulder angles. From the same creator of Trauma Broken Paradise.

name: Squab
description: Squab is a young pigeon who woke up in a cage, but his father Maximus had disappeared, leaving only a red cap behind. Find out how to save Maximus by overcoming unimaginable challenges in this thrilling and exciting adventure.

name: Knights Within
description: Knights Within is a 1-4 player hack&slash horde shooter with roguelite elements. Design custom loadouts, navigate procedurally generated levels and utilize random power-ups. Can you survive endless waves of enemies to ensure humanity's survival?

name: Mullet Madjack
description: Mullet Madjack is a single-player fast-paced FPS that brings you directly inside a classic anime. Power up your character and reach the last floor; Beat your best time or try again. Haste makes waste… of your enemies!

name: Cataclysm
description: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Aztec god of death, Mictian, and kill all angels.

name: Bellhop
description: Bellhop is a casual hotel management game. Meet clients' demands and basic needs to earn tips. Use your savings to upgrade and improve your tools.

name: StarStruck
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through this highly engaging science fantasy visual novel with memorable characters and multiple endings. Journey through space, uncover the past and pull off a heist or two as you negotiate the pitfalls of friendship and a crumbling reality. Can you save the universe?

name: SMYS: Show Me Your Stairs
description: SMYS is a 2-4 player local-multiplayer party game. Challenge your friends in this building race to the top! Gather blocs in various minigames and then use them to build your stairs as fast as possible, use your special items wisely to disturb your friends' minds and capture the flag first.

name: Baladins
description: Baladins is a choose-your-own-story multiplayer game (1-4 players online) inspired by Role-Playing Games. A whole campaign with friends, packed in 1-hour sessions!

name: Men of War II
description: Experience warfare like never before! Men of War II, the anticipated sequel to the acclaimed RTS franchise is here with all-new units, locations, campaigns and game modes, combined with the series’ trademark historical accuracy and action-filled gameplay on Eastern and Western Fronts of WWII.

name: Carth
description: Carth is a multiplayer medieval light fantasy survival rpg that brings an enormous open world map to explore, build, and thrive in. The Choices will be your own on how you survive in Carth.

name: Kyra's Light
description:
Cleanse the corrupted land, bring back Kyra's Light...

Jump from tile to tile and journey across various biomes filled with traps and enemies. Reach as far as you can in a procedurally generated world. The road is endless, test your skills and adapt new strategies with various weapons and new characters. Cleanse every biome and upgrade them to dive deeper towards the source of the corruption.

name: Furry Aim Trainer
description: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Furry girls! Shoot the girls with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!

name: Infinity
description: This is a role-playing sci-fi game.Use the A and D keys to move your character.Manipulate the character to complete the interaction to achieve the ending, including state control, and the mode of input content.

name: Orient on the Murder Express
description: This is a murder mystery visual novel where you take the role of the detective. Search for clues, make discoveries, and talk to other characters to find out what is truly going on on the Murder Express.

name: Kiwie vs. Desert: Uniform Pack
description: An outfit pack containing 3 new uniforms the Kiwie can wear: Astronaut Suit, Punk Attire, and Vibin' Artist.

name: Kiwie vs. Desert: Cute Pack
description: An outfit pack containing 3 new uniforms the Kiwie can wear: Unicorn Disguise, Pride Outfit, and Dinosaur Costume

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Foresight - Reimu Hakurei Winter Costume
description: Adds the "Reimu Hakurei (Winter Costume)" to Touhou Genso Wanderer -FORESIGHT-.

name: Parts of the Elephant
description: Weird things are happening in the Elephant Hotel. It's getting late, you're getting drunk, and moments in the lives of strangers are scattered around you like spilled puzzle pieces. Can you put it all together?

name: Bagel
description: "Bagel" is an exciting multiplayer online game. While civilians fight strategically to stop the Enemy, the Enemy does not hesitate to shout to hunt down civilians. Collect weapons, choose your class, and embark on a competitive school adventure!

name: Siberian Dawn: Winterflood
description: The Mentor Winterflood arrives in SIberian Dawn

name: DNA: Season 2 - Episode 3
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: The Great Escape
description: "The Great Escape" is a 2D platformer game where you explore each stage, collect keys, and find the exit. Dangerous obstacles and challenging terrain may block your path, but if you keep going, you can reach the portal to escape. Help them make their escape!

name: Uncharted World
description: Uncharted World - In the role of an experienced and brave explorer, you set off on an exciting adventure through uncharted lands. Your task is to explore vast expanses, explore wild forests, explore mountain ranges and explore mysterious deserts.

name: Jade Guardian
description: Jade Guardian - You take on the role of an unusual guardian made from precious jade who goes on a dangerous adventure to return stolen magical signs.

name: Pyramid Game
description: Pyramid Game inspires you to comprehend the real world in the game, hope you find your position in the pyramid early!

name: Sky Mad
description: Futuristic jet fighter combat racing game.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Johnny Razor-sharp Outfit
description: Even when on the hunt, Grandpa always expects everyone to look their best for dinner time! This DLC will give you one brand new outfit for Johnny.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Nancy Prim 'N Proper Outfit
description: Even when on the hunt, Grandpa always expects everyone to look their best for dinner time! This DLC will give you one brand new outfit for Nancy.

name: Godzilla Kaiju Wars VR
description: This unattended VR motion attraction features five action packed levels of cinematic VR at a level of intensity and realism never seen before … anywhere. Godzilla Kaiju Wars VR is designed from the ground up to provide the most compelling experience while providing Raw Thrills’ trademark reliability and longevity. This highly interactive VR game boasts the Thrill-D NXT motion platform, patented force-feedback blasters, wind and vibration effects, 6 channel Earthshaker audio, and featuring the massive 2X65″ GigaScreen video displays – to suck in a never ending stream of players!

name: Grokai
description: Grokai - An A.I. Generated Text Based "Choose Your Own Adventure" Game

name: Matchbox's Pizza Adventure
description: A Short Pixel-Art Platformer Game!

name: Mazaica
description: Extend all lines from numbers to fill up the grids. Puzzles are sometimes meditative. Yet often challenging.

name: Arcade Archives: Fighter & Attacker
description: Sin descripción

name: Tamaniwatori's Puzzle
description: This is a simple and sometimes tricky 3D puzzle game in which the egg-shaped chicken "Tamaniwatori'' hatches eggs. While avoiding the natural enemy "Tamawani", advance on the various scaffolds set up, hatch all the eggs, and aim for the goal.

name: Crunky's Fun Rager
description: Hop your way through an endless arcade running experience where you complete challenges, collect letters, and defeat the Crunko Pops and anything they may be hiding. The game features tons of Achievements to collect, Stats to track, and Daily Leaderboards to compete against!

name: Click On Spanners Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ spanners in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium

name: Boop a Cat
description: Boop a Cat is made for stress free gaming, a way to just relax and care for a virtual feline.

name: Blumgi Soccer
description: Blumgi Soccer offers a refreshing take on soccer. With big kicks and a dynamic physics system, every level invites you to strategize, kick, and score in ways you've never imagined. Get ready for a soccer experience like no other!

name: Crazy World of Caleb
description: Help Caleb get his girl back. To save her, Caleb needs to brave various locations. Run, Jump and Dash to avoid different type of enemies and make it to your destination.

name: Doot-Type
description: 2D Side Scrolling Shoot Em Up action. Cinematic cut-scenes carry the story on a quest to locate Mother Gator's secret weapon. Unlockable cheats will mix-up the gameplay or enjoy a randomizer mode. Game includes commentary by the developer and musical composer on the process of making the game!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Helgoland
description: Helgoland XP is a scenery for X-Plane that recreates Germany's only island in the open sea at a high level of detail and with many thrilling new options.

name: Zig Zag Jump: Fantasy Challenge
description: Click to Jump along the zig-zag course. You must direct a character across a fantasy winding path.

name: Clear Skye Thinking
description:
Alice Shah doesn’t want to go on holiday to Scotland, and she most definitely doesn’t want to go to grey, dreary Skye.

Alice has a love for elegant, classy clothes, and she spends hours on her appearance every morning. Alice considers herself a sophisticated, elegant lady, and she has no desire to go tramping through muddy fields to visit crumbling old castles.

Unfortunately for Alice, however, her dad is determined to spend their summer in Skye so he can meet up with a former friend, Ian Carter, and his family: his wife, the haughty Hilda, and their ginger spawn, the loud and boisterous Piper.

Alice hasn’t seen Piper since they were small children, and she has few memories of her. She doubts that she’ll be able to get on with anybody who lives on a teeny-tiny island full of sheep, but Alice is pleasantly surprised.

Piper isn’t as abrasive as her father, or as stuck-up as her mother. Piper is cheerful and laid-back, and she takes a liking to Alice almost at once.

A friendship begins to blossom between the two girls – but what will happen when Alice’s holiday ends and she has to go back to London?

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Easternvard Renaissance Edition
description: The Easternvard Overseers established their reputation by saving the entire queen's guard from an ill-fated ambush.

name: Hentai Class
description: Hentai class is a place where you can relax and have some fun with puzzles and beautiful teachers

name: Security Guard Sex: Episode 2
description: A visual novel series with animations about a guy working as a security guard: things take a wild turn when he notices a steamy scene between two women in the clothing boutique on his cameras.

name: Kidnappers
description: Kidnappers is a horror game where you aim to escape without being caught by mysterious visitors while retrieving the game you lent to your friend.

name: Sacred Earth: Reverie
description: A Point and Click RPG with Visual Novel elements, inspired by JRPG classics. Explore dungeons, build your characters, and battle foes in fast paced turn-based combat as you journey with your allies to discover the lost history of the past.

name: My Adaptation In(to) Human
description: It's a visual novel horror game that's published on Steam.

name: Waffle House
description: Waffle House is a set of 9 MBF21 maps by a small group of people who decided to get together and answer a simple question: "What is bro waffling about?". Maps are balanced for pistol start, target port is DSDA, and difficulties are implemented.

name: Duality
description: Duality is a 5-level map Doom 2 mini wad - MBF21 format where every map is a dual-themed tech base.

name: Dead by Daylight: Endless Hunt Pack
description: Fear follows in the Endless Hunt Pack, which includes 9 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most ruthless Chapters yet: Portrait of a Murder, Roots of Dread, Forged in Fog, and Tools of Torment.

name: Kingdom Imperial Collection
description: This is the ultimate Kingdom collection, containing the following entries in the award-winning strategy series: Kingdom New Lands, Kingdom Two Crowns, Kingdom Two Crowns: Norse Lands, and Kingdom Eighties.

name: Kingdom Heritage Bundle
description: Play through the ages with this great bundle of the award-winning strategy series Kingdom, combining medieval-inspired Kingdom Two Crowns with the 80’s-inspired Kingdom Eighties in a time-transcending bundle.

name: Valheim: Ashlands
description: The world is heating up and in the south something is stirring... The creatures of the Ashlands come to life as the biome update is here at last!

name: What the Fog
description: What the Fog?! You’ve been sucked into a cursed boardgame! Now you and a friend will need to work together to survive. Run, jump, dash, and shoot to escape swarms of angry monsters in this chaotic co-op roguelite from the world of Dead by Daylight.

name: Where Are They?
description: Where Are They? is a game of Where's Waldo? Are you able to find all the hidden things?

name: A Matching Game
description: This is a simple, single player game of selecting two cards and trying to find more matches than your opponent. The further you get into the levels, the more difficult the opponent gets.

name: Diablo IV: Loot Reborn
description:
Become the hero of your choosing. With a newly improved itemization system, the power is in your hands to craft the weapons of your dreams. Temper your gear with a new crafting system to face down hordes of enemies in the updated Helltides. Achieve the pinnacle of your build through Masterworking and try your hand at the daunting challenge of the Pit.

The armies of Hell are expanding their reach across the world of Sanctuary. New threat system, enemies, Blood Maiden boss, and events. Join the Iron Wolves in this seasons’ activities and fight to beat back the tides of Hell, earning you Reputation and rewards.

name: Anno 1800: Steampunk Pack
description: Give your city a more alternative look! Between art and science, the Steampunk Pack will let you adopt a style inspired by a path yet untaken for the Industrial Revolution, thanks to more than 18 new ornaments and skins for your city.

name: Cookard
description: Cookard is a cooking game where you run a restaurant by stacking cards to prepare and serve dishes to customers.

name: Atomite
description: Atomite is 30 levels of bright, cartoonish atom blasting 3D action; tens of thousands of atoms populate each level with their own unique properties. Search out the presents -- some which are booby-trapped -- to complete the level while avoiding varied enemies and environmental obstacles.

name: Ghost Moon High Noon
description: Guide the half-ghost bounty hunter Valentina Sombra through the haunted town of La Enmienda in this western top-down puzzle-shooter. Fire off spectral trick shots and wrangle your environment to put down rowdy spirits and help the grieving townsfolk move on.

name: Akayashiki
description: Akayashiki is a game where you must escape from a killer roaming the mansion.

name: Mid-Death Crisis
description: Mid Death Crisis is a strategic, turn-based couch co-op game designed for three players. Harness, empower, and strategically redirect spells to your comrades, enhancing your collective strength!

name: It's Slime-Creep Time!
description: It's Slime-Creep time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game. Set out with 1 of several soldier-like class-types. Destroy aliens with guns. Advance with new gear and different skills later on. Be the destructive renegade needed to save what is still remnant onto the earth.

name: Heromantic
description: Play a steely reporter or a rookie heroine, and brave your way through deadly secrets, evil plots, valiant heroes, and scheming villains in this parodical superhero visual novel!

name: Blood And Fear: Part 1
description: Experience a thrilling third-person shooter game with action, adventure, and romance. Fight zombies and soldiers, complete missions, and unlock new areas. Meet characters who will help you on your journey and have fun with both story and arena modes.

name: E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon
description: Manage your product company ! Design concept and sell product on the market ! Dodge bankruptcy and rise to the top by making the best concept, the best pricing strategy and applying the best management ! Beat all those damn competitors !

name: Squirmish: The Videogame of Brawling Beasties
description: Squirmish is a hilarious turn-based card-battling game for online PVP or solo play. Find your favorite creature cards and battle them against your opponent's beastie brigade. Strange strategies and interactions of the wildly-varying cards create a unique, unpredictable and infinitely-playable game!

name: Shield knight
description: Gain glory by defeating several leaders of a kingdom in ruins using only your shield as a weapon. Talk to the few remaining inhabitants and discover what secrets this kingdom holds.

name: Desolate City: Last Show
description: It's the last concert of his tour, and Don Aitor will have to survive the horror. Discover the consequences of the strange virus threatening the pixelated city of Gray Bay in this survival horror/action RPG.

name: Ru Lin Wai Shi Fan Jin
description: Fan Jin, who has failed in the exam for decades, has only one way to change his life - to pass the exam and become a successful candidate.

name: Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starship 43
description: Immerse yourself in this intense virtual reality indie sci-fi FPS action game. Explore Starship 43, fight hostile enemies, solve puzzles, and overcome obstacles to restore communication with Earth. Experience the isolation and danger of space as you uncover the station's secrets.

name: SCP Operations
description: In SCP Operations, tactical gameplay and strategic thinking are your greatest assets. Lead your team of four specialized agents through intense, turn-based combat scenarios. Customize and develop your squad by allocating talent points to enhance their abilities, choosing the perfect weapons, and equipping them for success. As you progress, you'll face off against the Chaos Insurgency, a formidable enemy bent on undermining the Foundation. Engage in meticulously planned battles against both human adversaries and a host of bizarre SCP entities, each with unique abilities and challenges.

name: Athenian Rhapsody
description: Athenian Rhapsody is a turn based RPG which includes intense and fast paced real-time-dodging. You'll be faced with many challenges, and you'll have to fight your way through the world by either fighting, or awkwardly trying to make friends with your opponents through pick-up-lines, mean jokes, memory games, and other strange and funny interactions.

name: Robobeat
description: Keep your trigger finger on the pulse! In rhythm shooter Robobeat, it’s all about maximising your damage by shooting to the beat. Wall run, grapple hook, slide, and bunny hop your way through the haphazard mansion of a crazed robot-showman.

name: Dread Delusion
description: Dread Delusion is an open world RPG brimming with strange places and dark perils. Carve your own path through the flying continents of a shattered land. Discover curious towns, unearth occult secrets, master powerful magic - and change the world through your choices.

name: Braid: Anniversary Edition
description: Solve puzzles by changing the flow of time in this remaster of the classic, award-winning game Braid. This remaster has new puzzles, hand-repainted graphics and fully reimagined sound, and a completely unreasonable amount of developer commentary.

name: Pickup 'N' Packup!
description: Pickup 'N' Packup! is a virtual reality puzzle game about putting objects around your house in their proper places. You don't have all day to clean up the place, so do your best to form the most efficient and quickest way to pick up everything and pack it up!

name: Car!
description:
CAR! is a simple game set against a mountain backdrop under a nice blue sky. With the player controlling the car, traverse down the road, whilst trying not to fall off and avoiding obstacles along the way.

CAR was nominated for the BAFTA YGD (Young Game Designers) Game Making 10-14 Award Too!

name: Deep Sea Hunter
description: A game similar to flying aircraft, where players navigate submarines in the vast depths ocean, engaging in thrilling fishing expeditions and mysterious deep-sea explorations through meticulous strategy and flexible mouse control. Unparalleled in its exhilaration, come play for the ultimate rush!

name: Null Reference Exception
description: Become a future AI and delve into 3D bullet hell action in an advanced lab. Combine various modules, repeat combat training, enhance stats with research points, and earn achievements to develop your unique combat style. Enjoy overcoming waves of enemies and defeating bosses within time limits.

name: Space Engineers: Signal Pack
description: Space Engineers: Signal pack includes Truss blocks set, Corridor blocks, Inset walls blocks, Decorative console blocks, a set of Bay windows as well as 9 tracks of live orchestra playing Space Engineers soundtrack for your jukebox.

name: Wingspan: Woodland Wonders Decorative Pack
description: From the emerald rainforest through the squat, heated baobabs to the gigantic soaring sequoias. Create your own wildlife preserve in the most beautiful forests in the world and choose a themed, adorable player portrait with Woodland Wonders Decorative Pack.

name: Box To The Beat VR: Electro Swing Pack
description: Dominate the ring with 10 electrifying electro swing tracks in the FREE "Electro Swing" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Jive to the beats and melodies as you throw knockout punches in this FREE DLC! Filled with vintage vibes and a modern twist.

name: Kicking The Ball Over Mountains Of Stuff
description: Game inspired by Getting Over it. Kick the ball over mountains of stuff to reach the end.

name: DNA: Season 2 - Episode 2
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Star Conflict: Bark-2 - Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes:Unique rank 16 gunship fighter “Bark-2”Special weapon: Autocannon 2M-84Active module: “GPB-20000”Unique portrait “Ivan Oakenshield”Additionally, the pilot receives:Permanent 10% bonus to credits gainPaint: “Hexagonal chain mail”Decor: “Fire of the Motherland”Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:Aiming overchar

name: She is Home Alone
description: Embark on a sky-high adventure in She is Home Alone! Take the wheel and race through the clouds towards your love interest's house in this quirky first-person endless runner, all while grooving to the synthwave soundtrack.

name: Wanderer's Shade
description: Embark on a mysterious journey in 'Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void,' a 2D pixel art and adventure game that blends intricate puzzles with deep narrative exploration. Discover secrets, solve challenges, and uncover a story of forgotten identities in an enigmatic world.

name: Underground Prisoner
description: Underground Prisoner is a necromancer's journey through a world of dangerous adventures in search of a precious soul herb that can summon and control the souls of the dead. Explore dark forests, abandoned cemeteries and dungeons, fight terrible monsters.

name: Moon Thirst
description: A lonely ancient vampire who was banished into the tangled and dangerous dark forests by the forces of ancient magicians. Left without your normal strength, you must explore cursed forests, encounter and defeat various enemies and creatures.

name: Mind the Abyss
description: Mind the Abyss is a fast-paced movement shooter that combines fourth-dimensional abilities and ever-evolving weaponry within an alien planet.

name: CyberHoney
description: Players can choose up to 4 heroes to fight. In hundreds of random levels, there are nearly 100 types of enemies and dozens of powerful Bosses waiting for your challenge. Each character has unique weapons and skills. Using different weapons can change character's attack range,

name: Hell Miners
description: Hell Miners is an action-packed 2D platformer roguelite where you dodge traps, defeat monsters and collect gold to build on your arsenal of powers, all while ascending to greater heights!

name: Prison Fights Simulator
description: Prison Fights Simulator - a game about survival in a brutal prison, fight until you kill everyone or die, no one relaxes in the prison!

name: Monster Cooking Diary
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dungeons Of Algoduul
description: Delay your death for as long as possible after finding yourself trapped in a neatly kept Dungeon full of skeletons without legs! Use your Fireballs, Powers, Physics and even use your enemies against each other as you stumble through your very own well lit purgatory!

name: Cosmotots
description: A frantic third-person Team Deathmatch arena shooter. Flank your enemies using hidden teleporters, tunnels, and floating islands. First team to 30 takes the glory. Get your loadout ready, engage in intense matches, and conquer the stars!

name: Le Dernier Don
description: Following a tragic event in an orphanage caused by horrific human experiments, an orphan tries to find other survivors while danger still lurks.

name: BuildWorld
description: Build Your Dream City

name: Animeahikoaprinceaverse A4: Prince Akihiko & Princess A
description: When the prince of the kingdom was cursed, rendering his magic uncontrollable, However, the curse weakened when the prince was near his two fiancées. One of his fiancées managed to discover the origin of the curse, and they embarked on an adventure to lift the curse from the prince.

name: Animal Bomb Chess
description: This is a Chess games. You can choose your animal at the beginning of the game. animals with their own characteristics, manipulate them to obtain props on the map, and use them. Although the process may test one's luck, you must still make every effort to survive until the end.

name: Labyrinth Hotel
description: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive, first-person, action-adventure game where the player wakes up locked in a jail cell and must escape, but the only way out is through the Hotel. Contains 20 unique levels, 4 bosses, many unique characters, a cool crt effect, and many secret levels.

name: Impossible Island
description: You're an ex-pirate stranded on a mysterious island and you need to hunt and build houses to survive. You must face challenges and enemies. You must solve mysteries and open locked doors. Explore this mysterious island alone or with other pirate friends

name: Angel Legion: Future Dream - Grey
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Live Day
description: This is a game that combines construction, shooting, and tower defense with a third person apocalyptic theme. In the apocalyptic environment, let players build apocalyptic strongholds that are suitable for their survival.

name: Cathedral
description: A long map that makes use of Tango's Supercharge mod.

name: Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths
description: Join Bubbly on an epic journey through the depths of the ocean in "Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths"! As a guardian of the sea, navigate through stunning underwater worlds and combat pollution in a quest to save marine life. Share your results on social media directly from the game.

name: Cazzarion: Sky Flight
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Robot Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Detective: Romance Visual Novel
description: At a New York high school, a group of friends discover a mystery that tests their friendship. As they investigate, feelings arise between them, which further complicates the situation.

name: When I Said "It's Ok To Be Cringe" I Didn't Mean Like That
description: A freeform exploration game about walking around and talking to people and interacting with things and nothing interesting happening.

name: Hunter Beat
description: Description: Hunter Beat is an exhilarating virtual reality game designed specifically for people who want to escape from everyday worries, shift to positive emotions, and enhance their concentration.

name: Mystic Labyrinth
description: Mystic Labyrinth is a top-down 2D bullet-hell rogue-lite game. Choose from multiple starting classes and use swords, spears, axes and magic to conquer the many themed floors of the labyrinth.

name: Trench Defender

name: Infinite Life Simulation
description:
"Infinite Life Simulation" is a life simulation game that pushes the boundaries of choice and immersion by leveraging advanced AI to generate unique life scenarios. Players navigate through a fully simulated life, from birth to old age, experiencing unpredictable events, challenges, and opportunities. The AI dynamically creates personalized, lifelike situations based on each player's decisions, allowing for infinite variations of life paths.

What sets Infinite Life Simulation apart is the interactive AI NPCs (Non-Playable Characters). Players can engage in real-time conversations with these NPCs, who respond intelligently based on the player's personality, relationships, and choices. Whether forming deep friendships, negotiating at work, or simply chatting with strangers, the conversations feel natural and lifelike, offering a richer, more engaging narrative experience.

From choosing careers and handling finances to relationships and personal growth, every decision and interaction matters in this game of endless possibilities. With no two lives ever the same, Infinite Life Simulation offers a truly one-of-a-kind life journey, where you shape your world and the people in it.

name: Aery: Calm Mind Bundle
description:
This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganmes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.
We hope you like them. So lean back and take a deep breath.

"Aquarium Designer" invites creativity in building and populating diverse underwater habitats, while "Cafe Owner Simulator" focuses on crafting a unique dining experience through detailed customization and staff management. Each game emphasizes strategic planning, design aesthetics, and business acumen, appealing to a broad audience with interests in biology, culinary arts, and entrepreneurship. Despite their different settings, both games challenge players to balance functionality with aesthetic appeal, enhancing their skills in resource management and strategic decision-making. Together, they provide a comprehensive simulation experience that blends creativity with critical thinking in engaging and educational ways.
