name: Eggstraction
description: Eggstraction is a multiplayer (4vs1) heist game where four feathered friends must face off against an egg-napping farmer. With chaos around every corner, can the chickens rescue their stolen eggs, or will they end up back in their cage?

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - The Dark Sea DLC
description: Long ago, the elves of the Dark Forest promised to protect the sea kingdom of Aquantis from the depth's evil creatures. Though, a war with the Demon Queen prevented them from doing so. And many inhabitants of Pentarull know how vengeful the depth's creatures can be...

name: Cakefoot
description: Cakefoot is an ultra-hard, single-button, minimalist avoid ’em up with natural physics that is simple to learn and difficult to master. The cake moves on a rail – hold to go forward, let go to fall back. If you can navigate the most challenging enemy patterns you’ve ever seen all the way to the end, you’ll be rewarded with – a new, harder difficulty.

name: Soviet Soldier
description: Experience history from the perspective of the Red Army in this story-driven FPS game. Make choices that will affect your comrades and the entire world. Fight in historical battles where you put down insurgents, eliminate enemies, and defend the motherland. The fate of the USSR rests in your hands.

name: Randy & Manilla
description:
Randy & Manilla is a game in which we discover a mysterious quantum cyber-universe hosted by Net-Cubes that contain virtual worlds with several game genres.

In gameplay terms, Each Net-Cube is a world, which contains levels that represent each video game genre. For example, Terra-Qubit has levels based on the platform games, Gamezone Cube on classic arcades, or Rol & Rogue on rogue-lite and RPGs.

name: Dead Get Rekt
description: In the shadow-drenched realm where modern warfare intertwines with necromantic horrors, we have conjured an unparalleled adventure. Forge your arsenal from an evolving deck of cards, face legions of the undead delvers, unearth artifacts of might and vanquish the darkness that festers down the Crypt!

name: DACHstudio Jigsaw Puzzle Box: Vanlau's Tinybuns
description: 20 beautifully hand drawn tinybun paintings from vanlau to puzzle.

name: DACHStudio Jigsaw Puzzle Box
description: Beautifully drawn artworks from the DACHstudio members for you to puzzle. Multiple difficulties from 4x4 to 28x26 pieces for everyone to enjoy.

name: Promise with My Sister
description: A story centered around sisters, and as their brother, I must protect them. My mission is to find and reclaim the memories of time spent with my sisters. Numerous adventures filled with challenges are just beginning. This is my very own RPG life!

name: Apathy Shougakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi Getsuyoubi
description: Sin descripción

name: Free.ksPeak
description: Aim for the "peak" of the freak world with a card game! FREEK.S PEAK, a trading card game full of freaks. Defeat enemies and acquire cards. Build your deck with the cards you get and become the best card player!

name: Fragmented World
description: Reconnect a fragmented world by switching between two perspectives – one for exploration and another for manipulating the fragmented world. Overcome intermediate levels where you'll need to employ lateral thinking and make decisions. Can you once again unite a decadent and broken world?

name: EOPN: Test RS
description: 'EOPN - Test RS' is a true test from the French Air & Space Force, turned into a sci-fi turn-based strategy game set in a nebulous future. Train for your selections or just enjoy the dive in this immersive experience where the goal is to take the best decisions to survive.

name: Garten of Banban 7
description: Explore the monster-occupied levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the dreads that reside below as you are now completely on your own. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Konkwest
description: Konkwest is a globe based, arcade grand strategy game. In one evening, you (and your friends) can play through a world conquest campaign. Many historical starting scenarios bring you into the game world and let you bring your empire to glory. The single-resource economy lets the game appeal to casual players too.

name: Chambers: The Outlaw
description: Step into the Weird Wild West of Chambers: The Outlaw, a thrilling first-person hellyeah-em-up! Explore the open world, conquer vast lands, engage in epic duels, and trade in bustling cities in this action-packed adventure! Chambers: The Outlaw is a prologue ver. of the game Chambers.

name: Enishia and the Binding Brand
description: Having sworn to protect the town's church, the gentle nun, Enishia, buys the deed to the land from a greedy merchant company. Now she must do odd jobs around the town to pay off the debt.

name: Princess Knight's Mission: Anna's Marvelous Adventures
description: The princess of the kingdom, Anna, received news of the resurrection of the Demon King. Despite her frustration with the demanding duties of governance, she donned the hero's attire blessed with the "Divine Blessing."

name: Duel of Honor
description: Duel of Honor is a dynamic battle on flying motorcycles, a gloomy atmosphere, bright music and memorable gameplay. The victory will be yours!

name: Moose Miners
description: Take control of a mining operation run by moose. They mine and sell the gems. You need to decide where to spend the profits. Hire more miners and upgrade their gear. Buy new rails and minecarts to get deeper into the mine. The deeper you get the more valuable gems you will find.

name: Arch Rivals
description: Arch Rivals is a one-in-the-chamber platform fighter where you duel your friends with your bow and arrow. Aim carefully and hope that you can pick your arrow back up!

name: Retrowave World
description: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, chrome robot women, speeding 80s supercars... Welcome to Retrowave World!

name: Bang Average Football
description: Experience the thrill of the beautiful game in Bang Average Football - the fast-paced, addictive, easy-to-learn football game for 1-4 players! Play against your friends for footballing glory in multiplayer, or turn a hopeless club into national champions as player-manager in Story mode!

name: Owinka Shooter 2
description: Owinka Shooter 2 throws you right back into the story of Owinka 427. Prepare to escape the Institute once and for all!

name: Blade of the Netherworld
description: You, who has signed a contract with the Netherworld, will find and kill these dangerous monsters. As the Blade of the Netherworld, you will experience a series of thrilling battles and challenges to keep the balance between the living and the dead.

name: This Thing of Ours
description: Welcome to New Temperance, known as the last frontier for the Italian-American mafia. The two controlling La Cosa Nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the city's rackets. You play as a young hood named Vinny that's in a neighborhood-based crew known as The Beacon Hill Crew.

name: Rogue Voltage
description: The engineering roguelike. Construct your own skills by wiring up modules. Build crazy machines to zap the monsters and trigger satisfying chain reactions.

name: Instruments of Destruction
description: Instruments of Destruction is a vehicle-building sandbox featuring advanced physics-based destruction. Create crazy construction vehicles and use them to demolish buildings and complete various objectives.

name: A Person Stands on an Empty Stage
description: A surrealist game about acting, identity, and words.

name: Last Mech Standing
description: VR rogue-like, arcade-style shoot-them-up. Pilot the Crimson Slayer, the last giant mech and humanity’s final hope. Slash waves of giant monsters with your sword & blast them with your minigun. Upgrade your weapons & tech along the way, find your fighting style, defeat bosses and level up!

name: DNA: Season 2 - Episode 1
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Drums Rock: The Proclaimers - 'I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)'
description: Get the track 'I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)' from The Proclaimers! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Green Day - 'The American Dream Is Killing Me'
description: Get the track 'The American Dream Is Killing Me' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Green Day - 'American Idiot'
description: Get the track 'American Idiot' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Disturbed - 'Stricken'
description: Get the track 'Stricken' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Green Day - 'Holiday'
description: Get the track 'Holiday' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Train Sim World 4: Cargo Line Vol. 2 - Aggregates
description: Discover different freight services with Skyhook Games' Cargo Line for Train Sim World 4. In Volume 2, get into the nitty gritty of aggregate services with the distinctive HOA Hopper - be ready to rock and roll.

name: Oil Strike '75
description: Get ready to earn while you learn in Oil Strike ’75, a fun, exciting, and educational new game from Cadal Corp! Run an oil rig and discover new oil deposits at the bottom of the sea – no matter the cost. Who knows what you’ll find!

name: Simple Fight 2
description: Match Man roguelike

name: Questscape: Survival
description: On a secluded medieval, awake in a small village surrounded by wildlife nature and bandits and many challanges. Evolve your land in search of new adventures.

name: Space Warrior
description: Use your skills and strategy to save your galaxy in Space Warrior, a fast-paced 2D survival game where you fight with alien invaders. Each level presents unique challenges and you need to defeat waves of enemies to survive.

name: Sprout of Control
description: Sprout of Control is a puzzle-game that requires wits, patience and timing. You can move in any direction as long as it is not occupied, but while moving, you can't change direction until you hit another solid object. Crawl your way through the levels and use evil fireflies to your advantage!

name: Iterations
description: Help solve a crime.

name: Survive Game
description: This is a relaxing, single player PC survival game where you can chop down trees, hunt, or build cabins to see how long you can Survive with wild animals and ai enemies throughout the large and beautiful map.

name: SpellRogue: Supporter Pack
description: The Supporter pack decks out each wizard with golden garbs. If you love SpellRogue and want to support us further, buying this DLC will help fuel further development. And, it also comes with our eternal gratitude and thanks for your love and support of SpellRogue.

name: Timeless
description: An exciting strategy action game wherein the player needs to outmaneuver mechanical adversaries in order to guide a cube to an awaiting pressure plate. Each time the player does so, it highens its score. The goal of the game is to get as high a score as possible.

name: The Pirate's Quest
description: The Pirate's Quest - You go in search of exciting adventures and ancient treasure hidden on a mysterious island. You will explore dangerous seas, coves and ancient ruins in search of a treasure map, face competitors and fight sea monsters.

name: WisdomGems
description: WisdomGems is a relaxing and challenging puzzle game where you have to solve temples by moving three gems to their correct square. WisdomGems takes inspiration from traditional games like the Rubik's Cube or the sliding puzzle, providing a minimalistic and intellectual experience.

name: Soul of the Forest
description: Embark on a quest to unite the forest against the tyrannical king in an hour long, turn based RPG epic! Soul of the Forest was created by a team of 55 students over the course of 2 semesters as a case study of modern turn-based RPGs.

name: Call of the Grave
description: You find yourself in an ancient graveyard, where mysterious statues and forgotten tombs hide ancient secrets. Under the moonlight, you solve puzzles, revealing a portal to dark caves. Inside, dark corridors await you, littered with bodies but no living souls.

name: Undercover: Secret Management
description: Help Veronica solve another dark mystery and reconcile with her sister.

name: Vector Space
description: It is a game about switching squares to make board full

name: Click The Link To Play
description: Sin descripción

name: Horror Family: Flight
description: Horror Family - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: Java Journey
description: Embark on a caffeine-fueled escapade! Play as a brave coffee cup reclaiming stolen treasures from tea slimes. Navigate charming landscapes, overcome obstacles, and solve puzzles. Join the whimsical adventure and taste victory!

name: Don't Drop Luggage!
description: Don't drop your cargo! Your job is a simple task to load the falling cargo well so that it does not fall off the back of the truck. Some of the packages may be a little unusual, such as bear figurines or lampposts, but don't worry about the details.

name: Check In
description: "Check in" is a pure collection-based game where there are no complex operations; completing all challenges simply requires checking in on different dates.

name: Amazônia Viva: Animais em Extinção
description: Embark on this adventure through the Amazon Rainforest, where you will take on the role of the legendary Curupira, the guardian of the forest. With the goal of saving endangered animals, you will face incredible challenges and learn about the rich biodiversity of the world's largest tropical forest.

name: Annuit Coeptis
description: Deckbuilder. Roguelite. Metaprogression. Words are a weak attempt to describe reality - in Annuit Coeptis you use cards to wreak violence across a land poised upon the brink of destruction. Will you defy the End of the World?

name: Parlor Board 3D
description: 3D Board Game with Dice

name: No Contact
description: After being left alone on a delivery ship, you find yourself on a space station that has gone to hell. Navigate through the dark corridors of the station while running and hiding from the dark forces in pursuit. Choose who you can trust, while uncovering the mystery of what happened.

name: Edge of Endless
description:
Edge Of Endless is the hottest new focus timer idle game hybrid to play while you do other things

Recharge the battery, start the vehicle. Keep moving forward until the battery runs out, then recharge it again until the next checkpoint.

name: Hidden Old House Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Reborn
description: Reborn is an Idle Roguelike RPG that combines strategic combat and village management. Delve into mysterious caves, manage a quaint village, and grow stronger with each adventure.

name: Kiteretsu Soudan Dial: Heard Mikaishuu Kaii nomi Shutsugen
description: Sin descripción

name: Orca
description: Orca is a very short, single map-long WAD visually influenced by rd's Eden, and otherwise inspired by the song scp2.mid.

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Succubus Cosmetic Pack
description: The Succubus cosmetic pack changes Miriam's appearance so she can fight demons in style! This cosmetic bundle contains six upgradeable items. When all are equipped, a special HUD will appear.

name: Smurftastic Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Magical Girl Cosmetic Pack
description:
The Magical Girl cosmetic pack changes Miriam’s default appearance so she can fight demons in style!

This cosmetic includes six unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When the entire set is worn, the character HUD will change to a unique appearance made just for this cosmetic.

Each item has its own stats and can be upgraded with crafting.

Individual items include:
- Miri Scepter (WEAPON)
- Miri Wig (HEAD)
- Miri Dress (BODY)
- Communicator (ACCESSORY)
- Summon Bu-chan (SHARD)
- Familiar: Bu-chan (FAMILIAR)

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Japanesque Cosmetic Pack
description:
The Japanesque cosmetic pack changes Miriam’s default appearance so she can fight demons in style!

This cosmetic includes six unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When the entire set is worn, the character HUD will change to a unique appearance made just for this cosmetic.

Each item has its own stats and can be upgraded with crafting.

Individual items include:

- Japanesque Umbrella (WEAPON)

- Japanesque Wig (HEAD)

- Japanesque Robe (BODY)

- Sarashi (ACCESSORY)

- Usagi Mask (ACCESSORY)

- Sakura Storm (SHARD)

name: 3D Puzzle: Hospital 1
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Pirates
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: WorldNeverland: Black Modern Wedding Outfit Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Oniko Kororin Game
description: Characters from Onigiri High School are now available as cute puzzles! Supported by UUUM, the song in the opening movie is actually NMB48! Roll the rice balls, stack them high, make them big, and go through various gimmicks to avoid red spots (!?) Get the "Legendary Salmon"!

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Bear-Serker Pack
description: Intimidate your enemies with this grizzly warrior costume. Look ripped and sweet with a kid-drawn six pack, facial tattoos, and vicious bear helmet. It's the perfect outfit to show everyone you are here to pillage and burn!

name: Word Guess
description: Guess the 5-letter word in the 5 tries. If you don’t, then you don’t. You can try again.

name: Hentai Girls: Fresh Firefighter
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Eggconsole Wanderers From Ys PC-8801mkIISR
description: The third installment of "Ys" with even more action-packed elements! Two years after the Ys adventure. Save Dogi's hometown, Felghana, from the clutches of evil!

name: Stellarons Superstars: Detectives of the Scarlet Horizons
description: Learn about this epic story of a world full of mysteries, where the enigmatic "Stellarons" are your allies in the fight against an evil sorceress who threatens to unbalance the universe.

name: Spot the Odd!
description:
Which One Doesn't Belong?
Sharpen Your Reflexes with This Spot-the-Difference Brain Game!

name: Vampire: Darkness Falls
description: Embrace the shadows or seek the light—survive the night in a world where your choices shape your destiny

name: Battle Minesweeper Online
description: Minesweeper is now available as a real-time online battle game!

name: Alien Survivors: To Starship Resurrection
description:
Defeat the aliens and repair your spaceship to survive!
Each stage equipped with a hot skill!
A roguelike shooter that blows everything away!
